# HMCharacteristicValueFilterChange.needed

**Case**

The filter needs to be changed.

## Declaration

```swift
case needed
```

## Filter Change Indicator

- **HMCharacteristicValueFilterChange.notNeeded**: The filter doesn’t need to be changed.
